laboratory_examinations.findings: The liver is normal in echotexture, without focal lesions or intrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation. Main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. The CBD measures 2 mm. The gallbladder is not severely distended and appears to have a folded fundus. There is wall edema and wall thickening. Multiple stones as well as sludge are seen within the gallbladder. The spleen measures 10.6 cm, and is normal in echogenicity. Right kidney measures 12.5 cm, shows no evidence of hydronephrosis, nephrolithiasis, or mass. The left kidney is atrophic, measuring 7.8 cm. No ascites.
